Text:
noob here: how do I play these?
Thanks for the torrent btw, I've been looking forward to this show.

Dude, it's an MKV file. You can use VLC to play those files (http://www.videolan.org/vlc/). Or download K-lite Codec Pack (http://www.free-codecs.com/download/K_lite_codec_pack.htm).

Thanks TvTeam! I was anxiously waiting for this show!
